example[0]: Women work in those sectors of the job market which pay the least.
example[1]: Which method causes the least damage to the environment?
definition[1]: used to emphasize how small something is, especially when it hardly exists at all
example[2]: I havenâ€™t the least idea what you are talking about.
example[3]: He used to wake at the least noise.
definition[2]: used when you are saying what someone should do in a situation, and suggesting that they should really do more
example[4]: The least you could do is give me her phone number.
example[5]: The least they could have given her is some money towards the rent.
